alert.note: Alert for Allen; Simpson; Warren (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 3:48PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Simpson, western Allen and south central Warren Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 248 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Three Springs, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Scottsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
